milestones.title: Project Initiation and Planning
milestones.description: Establishing project team, Identifying key stakeholders, Developing project charter, Creating detailed project plan, Risk identification and mitigation planning
milestones.paymentDetails: : Initial payment of 10% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone.

milestones.title: Road Repairs
milestones.description: Surveying and identifying areas requiring repair, Prioritizing repairs based on urgency and impact, Procuring necessary materials and equipment, Executing repair works, Quality assurance and testing
milestones.paymentDetails: : Payment of 25% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone.

milestones.title: Bridge Maintenance
milestones.description: Conducting thorough inspections of all city bridges, Identifying maintenance needs and prioritizing based on safety considerations, Procuring necessary materials and equipment, Executing maintenance works, Quality assurance and testing
milestones.paymentDetails: : Payment of 25% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone.

milestones.title: Public Utility Upgrades
milestones.description: Surveying public utilities and identifying upgrade needs, Prioritizing upgrades based on efficiency and impact on public services, Procuring necessary materials and equipment, Executing upgrade works, Quality assurance and testing
milestones.paymentDetails: : Payment of 30% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone.

milestones.title: Project Closure
milestones.description: Finalizing all project documentation, Conducting project review and lessons learned, Formal project closure and handover to city administration
milestones.paymentDetails: : Final payment of 10% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone.
